snippet: The state Assembly passed a bill today that would make California the first state to require repeat child molesters to undergo ''chemical castration.''     The bill now goes to Gov. Pete Wilson, who has said he would sign it....
lead_paragraph: The state Assembly passed a bill today that would make California the first state to require repeat child molesters to undergo ''chemical castration.'' The bill now goes to Gov. Pete Wilson, who has said he would sign it.
abstract: California Assembly passes bill that would make California first state to require repeat child molesters to undergo 'chemical castration'; Gov Pete Wilson says he will sign bill (S)
